scoringPlays.text: Olamide Zaccheaus 6 Yd pass from Bryce Perkins (Brian Delaney Kick)
Jordan Ellis 9 Yd Run (Brian Delaney Kick)
Olamide Zaccheaus 10 Yd pass from Bryce Perkins (Brian Delaney Kick)
Olamide Zaccheaus 12 Yd pass from Bryce Perkins (Brian Delaney Kick)

videos.description: QB Bryce Perkins finds Olamide Zaccheaus wide open in the back of the end zone on a 4th-down play to give Virginia the lead 7-0.
videos.headline: Virginia converts on 4th down for TD

videos.description: RB Jordan Ellis keeps his balance and finds the end zone for Virginia's second score of the game.
videos.headline: Ellis stumbles to 9-yard TD

videos.description: Matt Gahm and Chris Peace take down QB Jake Bentley for a 7-yard sack as Virginia's defense shuts out the Gamecocks in the first half.
videos.headline: Virginia caps off strong first half with sack

videos.description: Olamide Zaccheaus scores his second touchdown in his final game as a Cavalier, putting Virginia up 21-0.
videos.headline: Virginia's Zaccheaus finds end zone for 2nd time

videos.description: QB Jake Bentley and his receiver aren't on the same page during a 4th-down attempt as South Carolina's woes continue.
videos.headline: Gamecocks fail to find end zone on 4th down

videos.description: South Carolina forces a fumble by Virginia's Hasise Dubois early in the 4th quarter.
videos.headline: South Carolina finds momentum on forced fumble

videos.description: South Carolina's Jake Bentley gets picked off by Juan Thornhill for a 54-yard return shortly after the Gamecocks recovered a fumble.
videos.headline: Virginia's Thornhill returns interception 54 yards

videos.description: Olamide Zaccheaus gets separation in the end zone for his third touchdown, putting him at 100 receiving yards for the game.
videos.headline: Zaccheaus catches 3rd TD of game
